<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Use the current completer to produce a CompletionAction for the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// completion request. If the current completer is a list completer, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will return an AK&#95;Insert CompletionAction if each completion has a common</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// prefix, or an AK&#95;ShowCompletions CompletionAction otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Buffer The string to complete</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Pos The zero-based cursor position in the StringRef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
